channel.title: Hey got a server problem can't get on
channel.description: hey im new to this mopar thing and i've played runescape, but enuff of that, the problem is: that on the log in screen i find a server and i type in the username i desire and the password, but everysingle server doesn't work for me. i don't know why but ever server i type in a press log in to says that it is down at the time, then i tryed to start my own server ( you know that button that says " start server" at the log in screen) and that says its even down, and i need help getting onto the acual game, please please help me. ='( .

item.title: Hey got a server problem can't get on
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

when you press “Start Server”… change the IP on the login screen to 127.0.0.1. If that doesnt work, change it to “localhost” (without quotes). One should work, though.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey got a server problem can't get on
